evidence.claim: AHIMA provides resources and guidance on FHIR standards for health information exchange.
The organization emphasizes compliance with HIPAA regulations within health information management.
AHIMA offers resources regarding HL7 standards for interoperability in healthcare.
Discussion on X12 EDI transactions as they relate to health information coding and billing.
